word_mean: 支气管痉挛：支气管平滑肌痉挛性收缩，如在支气管哮喘发作时

sentence.Network_en: Anaphylactic and anaphylactoid reactions can be associated with bronchospasm and pulmonary edema.
sentence.Network_cn: 过敏及类过敏反应,可导致支气管痉挛及肺水肿.

sentence.Network_en: Additional complications include bradycardia, laryngospasm, bronchospasm, and apnea owing to pharyngeal stimulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 其它并发症包括因为咽部刺激导致的心动过缓 、 喉痉挛 、 支气管痉挛和呼吸暂停.

sentence.Network_en: Nonspecific non immunologic histamine release may also cause bronchospasm.
sentence.Network_cn: 非特异性非免疫性组胺释放可导致支气管痉挛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 4.呛咳(bucking)5.支气管痉挛(bronchospasm)6.吸痰操作不当

list.abs: Nonspecific non immunologic histamine release may also cause bronchospasm ., 非特异性非免疫性组胺释放可导致支气管痉挛.
矛盾性支气管痉挛 （paradoxical bronchospasm） 应牢记吸入糖皮质激素可能会出现矛盾性支气管痉挛，此时需要停药和替换治疗。 …

means.word_mean: 1. a spasm of the bronchi that makes exhalation difficult and noisy; associated with asthma and bronchitis
